timeline.title: Guests Arrive
timeline.description: Your arrive early as to not miss the the entrance from the bride. You try to calming the grooms nerves as he paces nervously awaiting for his bride

timeline.title: Here comes the bride
timeline.description: The fanfare starts and she makes her grand entrance. All the guests are overcome with emotion and whisper amongst themselves about how beautifal she looks
